segments.text: Hello , Tom ! Do you have plans for this evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about having dinner with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great . I would love to . And when ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let ’ s fix it at seven o'clock , OK ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . However , maybe I should come early to help you prepare the dinner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t worry . I will arrange everything .
segments.speaker: S1
